author: Sharon Kelly and Emily J Gertz
description:
A group of more than 85 climate experts today released a scathing review of the Trump administration’s “Climate Working Group” report on climate change science, condemning it as “biased, full of errors, and not fit to inform policymaking.” The reviewers include MacArthur “Genius” Fellows, a half-dozen members of the National Academy of Sciences, Royal Society […]

The post Scores of Climate Experts Condemn Trump Climate Report as ‘Junk Science’ appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Scores of Climate Experts Condemn Trump Climate Report as ‘Junk Science’

author: Mitch Anderson
description:
On Sept. 29, 2015, then-Bank of England Governor Mark Carney strode to the podium at Lloyd’s of London and delivered a landmark speech on the threat of climate change to the financial sector, insurance industry and the world in general.  To avoid catastrophic consequences, Carney urged governments and business leaders to recognize that the “vast […]

The post Mark Carney’s Climate Warning from 2015 and the Perils of Pragmatism appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Mark Carney’s Climate Warning from 2015 and the Perils of Pragmatism

author: Jen St. Denis
description:
This story is being published in collaboration with The Tyee, an award-winning independent media outlet based in BC.  A controversial report published this summer by the U.S. Department of Energy that alleges humans may not be the primary cause of climate change is being cited by the Donald Trump administration to abolish regulations on the […]

The post Meet The Canadian Aiding Trump’s ‘Insane’ War On Climate Science appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Meet The Canadian Aiding Trump’s ‘Insane’ War On Climate Science
